entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING, Dauphin
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:41 p.m. CDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow or rain. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning early this evening then changing to snow late this evening. Blowing snow before morning. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 15 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow in the evening. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Tuesday 18 April 2023
